title: 15 Years Old and 2,750 Miles: How Edyn Teitge Became the Youngest Solo Tour Divide Finisher
content:
The Idaho teen planned methodically for over a year before tackling the bikepacking race. Then, he 'just kept pedaling.'

Read the full article at 15 Years Old and 2,750 Miles: How Edyn Teitge Became the Youngest Solo Tour Divide Finisher on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
